nodes.text: Cybernetic disguise implants were a type of cybernetic implant that were composed of a series of systems embedded beneath an individual's skin that allowed their users to alter their appearance. These systems were implanted throughout the body and allowed near-total alteration of the user's physical appearance. The cost of a cybernetic disguise implant was 18,000 credits.
The cybernetic disguise implant was mentioned in Gadgets and Gear, a roleplaying supplementary sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying series that was published by Fantasy Flight Games in 2019.
